COMMUNICATIONS, MEDIA, AND ENERGY & UTILITIES (CME) MANAGED PACKAGE INSTALLATION GUIDE
Post-Upgrade Steps for Earlier Releases of ​Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy

This guide includes post-upgrade instructions for earlier releases of Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy (CME).

Upgrade Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Spring '24
Use the instructions in these topics to upgrade any release of Industries CME since Winter '18 directly to Spring '24. If you’re looking for installation links for previous versions, contact Salesforce Customer Support for help.
Upgrade Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Winter '24
Use the instructions in these topics to upgrade any release of Industries CME since Winter '18 directly to Winter '24. If you’re looking for installation links for previous versions, contact Salesforce Customer Support for help.
Upgrade Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Summer '23
Use the instructions in these topics to upgrade any release of Industries CME since Winter '18 directly to Summer '23.
Upgrade Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Spring '23
Use the instructions in these topics to upgrade any release of Industries CME since Winter '18 directly to Spring '23.
Upgrade Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Winter '23
Use the instructions in these topics to upgrade any release of Industries CME since Winter '18 directly to Winter '23.
Upgrade Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Summer '22
Use the instructions in these topics to upgrade any release of Industries CME since Winter '18 directly to Summer '22.
Upgrade Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Spring '22
Use the instructions in these topics to upgrade any release of Industries CME since Winter '18 directly to Spring '22.
Upgrade Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy Applications Package to Winter '22
Use the instructions in this topic to upgrade any release of CME since Winter '18 directly to Winter '22.
Configure Product Designer for ​Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy (Upgrade)
This topic contains configuration steps for the Product Designer. Product Designer is the next-generation Product Catalog administration application. It provides a unified user experience with improved efficiency and agility to launch products quickly to market, giving both business and IT users access to all the product management capabilities they need.
Configure Pricing Designer (Upgrade)
This topic contains configuration steps for the Salesforce Industries Pricing Designer. Salesforce Industries Vlocity Pricing Designer is the next-generation pricing administration application. It provides a unified user experience with improved efficiency and agility to create and maintain product pricing, promotions, and associated rules, giving both business and IT users access to the pricing management capabilities they need.
Post-Upgrade Steps for Product Designer
This topic contains configuration steps for upgrading the Product Designer to the latest. Product Designer is the next generation Product Catalog administration application. It provides a unified user experience with improved efficiency and agility to launch products quickly to market, giving both business and IT users access to all the product management capabilities they need.
Configure Pricing Designer
This topic contains configuration steps for the Salesforce Industries Pricing Designer. Salesforce Industries Pricing Designer is the next-generation pricing administration application. It provides a unified user experience with improved efficiency and agility to create and maintain product pricing, promotions, and associated rules, giving both business and IT users access to the pricing management capabilities they need.
